title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.7 - Auto theft prevention program decal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.7 - Auto theft prevention program decal

State Regulations

An auto theft prevention program decal, described fully in

Part 72 of this Title, may be affixed by a police officer to the inside, lower
left corner of a vehicle's rear window, and may be displayed until there is a
change of registration and ownership. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
